question: Which state/UT government has signed an agrrement with J-PAL to conduct real time monitoring of its public services?
explanation: Delhi govt. signs MoU with J-PAL (Abdul Latif Jameel Poverty Action Lab), co-founded by 2019 Nobel laureate Abhijit Banerjee, to conduct real-time monitoring of its public services. The Abdul Latif Jameel Poverty Action Lab (J-PAL) is a global research centre which was founded in 2003.The project will be kicked off as a pilot, to study the beneficiary experience in ration shops under the Public Distribution System (PDS) as well as in mohalla clinics.
